summary:
Conversion of West Wind Combat Series - Misfit Mage UNP to the Sevenbase-7B Cleavage Body.
Thanks to  brokefoot for the permission and Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 for the 7B bodies.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/9521/2e1x.png[/img][/center]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] INTRODUCTION [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3]This mod is a conversion of [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36780/?] West Wind Combat Series - Misfit Mage UNP [/url][/b] to the 7B Cleavage Body

Bodyslots compatible with Dual Shelth Redux and SOS.
If you find any issue post them in the comments section.
Now is possible to craft the Misfit Set in the forge.

The original armor and all its textures are required! Links below.[/size]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] REQUIRED [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36780/?] West Wind Combat Series - Misfit Mage UNP [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992//?] SeveNBase FemaleBody Replacer [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[b][color=crimson]A BBP Skeleton is required or you get a CTD - So choose one [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800//?] XP32[/url][/b] or  [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16712/?] Skulltyrant's [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse![/size]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][color=Slategray][size=5pt] CREDITS [/size][/color][/font][/b]
[size=3]Special thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] brokefoot [/color][/b] for making the [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36780/?] West Wind Combat Series - Misfit Mage UNP [/url][/b]
Please also endorse [b][color=Lightsteelblue] brokefoot's [/color][/b] work!

Much thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 [/color][/b] for the 7B body 
and variations!

[b][color=Lightsteelblue] XP32 [/color][/b] and [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Skulltyrant's [/color][/b] for the BBP and TBBP skeletons and a lot of compatibility between mods.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Nightasy [/color][/b] for making all the tutorials on 3ds MAX.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Shockero [/color][/b] for giving me some finishing tips on converting amors.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] SkyrimTuner [/color][/b] for the [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30936/?] RealVision ENB [/url][/b]
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] missjennabee [/color][/b] for the amazing [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30936/?] Expanded Towns and Cities [/url][/b] - Screenshots in the mod were taken in Riverwood.[/size]

[b][color=Lightsteelblue][size=4] My other conversions [/size][/color][/b]
[b][size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42292//?] Assault Armor - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45334/?] Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45427/?] Nightshade Armor - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42292//?] Sexy Tsuns Armor Mashup - Sevenbase-7B Cleavage [/url][/size][/b]


Original armor Credits/Thanks:

_Mr TroubleMaker and Dikr - for the Bouncy Bodice mod. I used portions of the textures as a basis for this mod.
_SydneyB and Dimon - for the Ashara Princess stockings. I used portions of Sydney's textures and also Dimon's original meshes for this mod.
_Anano - for, yet again, the Osare panty mesh. I used my variation from Khantu's Armor set as a basis for this version.
_AsianBoy345 - for the Tera Armor UNP Collection. I used the meshes/textures of one of the sets for the basis of the Misfit Mage bracers.
_Dimon - UNP body form. He started the Rebellion. I'm glad to have helped bring this more natural female body form to its high status.
author: bla08
